definition: A self-employed professional who offers specialized services or expertise, typically in fields such as consulting, creative arts, or freelance work. This term is commonly used to refer to individuals who work independently and are not employed by a specific company or organization.

examples.english: As a freelancer, one works independently.

examples.german: Viele Kreative sind als Freiberufler tätig.
Freiberufler müssen ihre eigenen Steuern zahlen.
examples.english: Freelancers have to pay their own taxes.

examples.german: Die Zahl der Freiberufler in Deutschland steigt stetig.
examples.english: The number of freelancers in Germany is steadily increasing.
